placeholderImages.title: Paneer Butter Masala
placeholderImages.description: A slightly sweet creamy dish of paneer, in which the gravy is prepared usually with butter, tomatoes, cashews or cream.

placeholderImages.title: Chole Bhature
placeholderImages.description: A classic Punjabi dish featuring spicy chickpea curry (chole) served with fluffy, deep-fried bread (bhature).

placeholderImages.title: Masala Dosa
placeholderImages.description: A popular South Indian breakfast dish, a crispy crepe made from fermented rice and lentil batter, filled with a spiced potato mixture.

placeholderImages.title: Hyderabadi Biryani
placeholderImages.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with meat or vegetables and a blend of rich, flavorful spices. A signature dish of Hyderabad.

placeholderImages.title: Pav Bhaji
placeholderImages.description: A flavorful mash of mixed vegetables in a spicy tomato-based gravy, served with soft, buttered bread rolls (pav).

placeholderImages.title: Idli Sambar
placeholderImages.description: Soft, fluffy steamed rice cakes (idli) served with a hot and tangy lentil-based vegetable stew (sambar).

placeholderImages.title: Rajma Chawal
placeholderImages.description: A comforting North Indian dish of red kidney beans cooked in a thick, spicy gravy, served with steamed rice.

placeholderImages.title: Aloo Paratha
placeholderImages.description: A popular Indian flatbread stuffed with a delicious spiced potato mixture, pan-fried to golden perfection.

placeholderImages.title: Khaman Dhokla
placeholderImages.description: A soft, spongy, and savory steamed cake made from gram flour, perfect as a light snack or breakfast.

placeholderImages.title: Dal Makhani
placeholderImages.description: A rich and creamy lentil curry made with whole black lentils and kidney beans, slow-cooked with butter and cream.

placeholderImages.title: Pani Puri / Golgappe
placeholderImages.description: A popular street food snack consisting of hollow, crispy puris filled with spicy tamarind water, potatoes, and chickpeas.

placeholderImages.title: Samosa
placeholderImages.description: A deep-fried pastry with a savory filling, such as spiced potatoes, onions, peas, or lentils.

placeholderImages.title: Malai Kofta
placeholderImages.description: A creamy and rich curry made with deep-fried potato and paneer balls (koftas) dunked in a smooth, mildly sweet gravy.

placeholderImages.title: Vegetarian Thali
placeholderImages.description: A complete Indian meal served on a single platter, featuring a variety of small dishes like curries, dal, rice, bread, and dessert.

placeholderImages.title: Jalebi
placeholderImages.description: A spiral-shaped, crispy and chewy sweet made by deep-frying flour batter and soaking it in saffron-infused sugar syrup.

placeholderImages.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
placeholderImages.description: Chunks of roasted marinated chicken in a spiced curry. The curry is usually creamy and orange-coloured.

placeholderImages.title: Goan Fish Curry
placeholderImages.description: A spicy and tangy fish curry from the coastal region of Goa, made with coconut milk and a blend of aromatic spices.

placeholderImages.title: Palak Paneer
placeholderImages.description: A popular vegetarian dish consisting of paneer in a thick paste made from pur√©ed spinach and seasoned with garlic, garam masala, and other spices.

placeholderImages.title: Garlic Naan
placeholderImages.description: A leavened, oven-baked flatbread, typically flavored with garlic and butter. Soft, chewy, and perfect for dipping into curries.

placeholderImages.title: Gulab Jamun
placeholderImages.description: Soft, spongy, milk-solid-based balls soaked in a fragrant sugar syrup. A classic Indian dessert for celebrations.

placeholderImages.title: Chocolate Cake
placeholderImages.description: A rich and decadent layered chocolate cake with a smooth frosting, perfect for any celebration.

placeholderImages.title: Rice Kheer
placeholderImages.description: A traditional Indian rice pudding made with milk, rice, sugar, and garnished with nuts and raisins.

placeholderImages.title: Mango Pudding
placeholderImages.description: A sweet and creamy dessert made from fresh mango puree, milk, and sugar, often served chilled.
